snippet.title: Mario's Early Years! Fun With Letters (PC) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of The Software Toolwork's 1994 PC CD-ROM edutainment title, Mario's Early Years! Fun With Letters.  

The video shows all of the "games" or "events" (or whatever you want to call them) featured in this Dos CD Mario game that was officially licensed by Nintendo, despite their utter lack of involvement in the development or publishing of the game on the PC. The Super NES version is essentially the same thing, though with lower resolution graphics and missing the sing-along songs. I was playing them from the Mario's Early Years! Collection CD, hence the first menu screen you see in the video. 

If you like Mario oddities, this is definitely one for you!

For the sing-along songs from all three titles in the series, see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AlGH6eI8toY
____
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
